channel.title: Gambling
channel.description: ok i played a server awhile back now i think it wass dds-specz V1 and it had gambling in it. there was a chest where say you gamble 100m and got an item, the higher your thieveing the more likely you will get a rare, i doubt you would have too code this from scratch and its probably on some sources already out there, can anyone point me too a guide?
